phrases: It is such a waste to spoil such a cute face with a furrowed brow.
Wha-Wha-Wha-What did you do that for?!
I guess that really was just an accidental bump, huh?
I have been trying so hard...
Even though you rejected me, I have been trying my best.
But if I go on liking you like this, nothing will change.
I have had enough of this.
I am through with loving you!
A Dangerous Man Maity's Sweet Seduction
When I was sick and you came to visit me...
I was staring at your face like this...
There was a grain of rice stuck to it.
We should have bread for breakfast!
A Japanese breakfast should consist of rice and miso soup.
Were not you the one who said that?
I have had enough of rice!
So then I was thinking I would take this rice off while making a joke, when I suddenly got dizzy...
Apparently my first kiss was just an accident.
He did not try to kiss me.
He was just trying to take off the rice that was stuck to my hair,
Does that character from that game of yours like bread or something, Ni-chan?
Cain-sama has croissants and cafe au lait for breakfast.
I need to be like him, otherwise it will be a problem when we get married.
Risa, hurry up and come back to this world!
I am Koizumi Risa, 17 years old.
A girl who is just a little on the tall side.
The truth is, I have a crush on someone right now.
It is great that you are so full of energy today.
I am always full of energy.
You passed me when you ran down the hallway.
You can talk to me any time if you feel like it.
Koizumi, I wan to talk to y
I heard a voice, but I do not see anyone.
Or is there a guy about one inch tall hiding somewhere around here?
Maity-sensei, I am looking forward to your class as always!
After stealing a kiss from my lips, are you just going to ignore me?
What are you saying in front of Maity-sense?!
You are ditching me now that the deed's been done?
How typical of a comedy duo.
You two sure get along well.
And we are not a comedy duo, either.
I have been acting like a fool.
I do not like this idiot anymore.
When I think about it, it is a total waste of time.
What do you mean, you have given up?
Well, you know... youth is fleeting.
If I keep chasing after an idiot like that,
I am just tired of Otani's idiocy.
You have worked so hard up until now...
From this day onwards, I am taking the first step towards my new love!
Hey, Maity-sensei, how old are you?
Well, it is somewhere around there.
What is with this chilly atmosphere?
Do not tell me her new love is Maity-sensei?
Not good, not good, this is not good!
I mean, I have already given it my best.
No matter how hard I tried, nothing changed.
Koizumi forced a kiss on me.
This happens to you a lot, huh, Otani?
Last time it was Seiko-chan who did it, right?
Cannot you see how shocked I am?!
How on earth did that happen, anyway?
W-Well... I am not really sure.
But I supposedly kissed her before.
What do you mean by that?
It happened while I had a fever, so I do not remember.
So you violated her and you do not even remember?
And as for who violated who...
I was the one who was violated...
Koizumi-san sure has been trying hard.
Koizumi-san sure has been trying hard.
You said yourself you could not remember.
I did not forget that much!
But she said she is giving up.
I am the president of the Maitake Kunimi Fan Club, aka Maity Club.
To commemorate the formation of our club, we have invited Maity-sensei himself.
Now, raise your hand if you have a question for Maity-sensei.
Sensei are you going out with anyone right now?
Sensei, could it be you are *** ***?
It seems to be a club dedicated to Maity-sensei.
Do not say huh, you idiot!
This is all your fault, Otani-kun.
Do something about this Maity Club!
If you were not such an idiot, you would not be in this situation wondering whether you would kissed or not!
If you just apologized, I am sure Risa would let it go.
Just get her to quit that stupid club, idiot!
The coach sprained his hip, so it is canceled for a while.
That is going a bit too far...
Even though it was a spur of the moment thing, the fact that I
Did I really kiss you while I had a cold?
I just told you to let it go, did not I?!
For forgetting that you kissed me?
Or for not seeing me as a girl, no matter what I do?
You do not have to put on such a confused expression.
Sorry for bothering you for so long.
You do not need to worry about me.
Do not give up on me!
But I guess that is impossible.
There is no way that would happen.
Oh, are you going home now?
Koizumi-san sure has been trying hard.
But if I go on liking you like this, nothing will change.
I am through with loving you!
I do not think I can be friends with Risa anymore.
Is that another Maity Club activity?
I said, starting today, Maity-sensei is going to be the coach for the basketball club.
The coach has sprained his hip, so just bear with it until he gets better.
Why the heck does that guy have to be his substitute?!
Otani-kun, you have to do something about this.
At this rate Risa really will fall for that cold guy.
What do you mean, Like I care?!
She as the one who chose to go after him on the rebound.
Hey, please do not bully my cute Nobu-chan.
I am the one being bullied!
Sorry about that sudden outburst yesterday.
I do not know what happened, but do not push yourself too hard, okay?
I am going to watch the basketball club and cheer for you today, Maity-sensei.
I will look forward to it.
Well, why do not you decide?
We need to cheer properly for Maity-sensei.
I played basketball all through high school.
I plan to devote my youth to Maity-sensei from now on.
Good lord, would you stop this?!
I absolutely refuse to let you be with a guy like him!
But it is not like I have any choice.
I tried so hard, and even when I said I was giving up, he did not even try to stop me.
He could not steal the ball from Maity-sensei, you see.
Maybe he is off being depressed somewhere...
Risa, go find him and talk to him.
He might go so far as to quit basketball after this.
I would like to ask you something.
Is that all right with you?
Were you the reason for that?
You looked pretty mad just now.
What is it to you, anyway?!
You need to be gentle with them.
It is none of your business!
Koizumi-san probably likes you a lot.
I was wondering how you feel about her.
That is none of your business.
Then maybe I will take her for myself.
Are you really all right with that?
I said, do whatever you want!
I do not like Koizumi or anything!
Did I hear that right, just now?
I have been rejected by the same guy twice?
Quit that disgusting Maity Club, already.
